    Displays file content to stdout

    FsUsage
    Base class for commands related to viewing filesystem usage, such as du and df
    FsUsage.Du
    show disk usage
    FsUsage.TableBuilder
    Creates a table of aligned values based on the maximum width of each column as a string

    Get a listing of all files in that match the file patterns.
